assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Professor Monckton has been a paid scientific consultant of Biogen Idec, AMO Pharma, Charles River and Vertex Pharmaceuticals. Professor Monckton also has a research contract with AMO Pharma.

publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
